Chinese.Description: 现在你持有最多6枚可随时间缓慢补充的金币，使用矛命中投出的金币后将会提升伤害并自动偏转向下一枚金币或者其他生物。<LINE>玩家投出的矛将瞬间到达目的地，发生偏转的矛将具有穿透能力

English.Description: You currently hold a maximum of 6 coins that replenish slowly over time. When a thrown spear hits a coin, it increases in damage and automatically deflects towards the next coin or another creature.<LINE>Spears thrown by players will instantly reach their destination, and deflected spears will gain the ability to penetrate through targets.
